name: Santa's Demonic Rescue
description:
A 2D game where the player must play as Santa Claus. As Santa Claus you must shoot through enemies and retrieve presents stolen by demons that have to be delivered to all the children of the world by Christmas. Now it is up to you to play as Santa armed with an assault rifle to kill the demons and retrieve your stolen presents and save Christmas.

Please feel free to comment any bugs, issues, or other concerns you may have with the game. 

In addition we do appreciate feedback so if you can find the time please fill out the survey linked below so that we can further improve your experience with this and/or upcoming projects. 

Once again thanks for playing and enjoy the rest of the holidays and the new year.

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfllmC6OCeyGtn-PQ6Tg6eTwe4Ut8tWpQ7DdFKP...
